fields.name: identifier
fields.description: UUID, DOI or ISBN of the creative work. A UUID be generated if not included.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Name given to the creative work.

fields.name: language
fields.description: Specify the language of the creative work. Two letter code defined by ISO 639-1.

fields.name: creator
fields.description: Name of a person, organisation, etc. responsible for the creation of the work. May be more than one.

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: Name of a person, organisation, etc. that played a secondary role - such as an editor - in the creation of the work. May be more than one.

fields.name: date
fields.description: The publication date of the creative work. Provide in ISO format, YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: The subject, or tag, of the creative work. May be more than one.

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: Name of a person, organisation, etc. responsible for making the creative work available.

fields.name: rights
fields.description: Information about copyright held in and over the creative work. Formatted as you wish it to appear.
